articles.author: Sean Walker, KSL.com
articles.title: It's official: No. 11 BYU will play No. 5 Texas Tech for Big 12 title — after home finale with UCF - KSL.com
articles.description: The Cougars didn't have to wait until after Saturday's 11 a.m. kickoff in Provo to clinch their first Big 12 championship game berth: Arizona did that for them Friday night.
articles.content:
PROVO BYU didn't have to wait until after Saturday morning's kickoff against UCF (11 a.m. MST, ESPN2) to clinch a spot in the Big 12 championship game.
In that regard, Arizona took the suspense out … [+3904 chars]

articles.author: Isis Almeida, Katherine Doherty, Christian Dass
articles.title: CME Partially Restores Operations With Restart of Forex Platform - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: The Chicago Mercantile Exchange restored trading operations in time to wrap up a holiday-shortened week in the US, recovering from an hours-long technical outage that had disrupted multiple financial markets across Asia and Europe.
articles.content: The Chicago Mercantile Exchange restored trading operations in time to wrap up a holiday-shortened week in the US, recovering from an hours-long technical outage that had disrupted multiple financial… [+392 chars]

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold To Cost Just A Trifle More Than Apple’s iPhone Fold - Wccftech
articles.description: Samsung appears to be pricing the upcoming Galaxy Z TriFold at a very attractive price point in anticipation of Apple's iPhone Fold.
articles.content: Samsung appears to be deliberately pricing the upcoming Galaxy Z TriFold at a very attractive price point in anticipation of Apple's iPhone Fold, which is expected to launch in the second half of 202… [+1904 chars]
